pages.text: Sauteed food is another kind of custom cuisine. They are cooked in pans, including stone griddles. It's properties are the sum of its ingredients.

Alike stew cooking, raw ingredient are also available for frying. Compare to stew cooking, Frying does not need any sort of fluid and is much faster, which means less fuel consumption. But it's saturation boost is lower and no potion can be added
Shift + right click can place sauteed dishes onto the world.
